participant_1.background:
I'm a big animal lover and do what I can to help them in my free time.
every fall i visit my sister in canada.
I'm a big guy with a big heart, and I love my family and my culture.
i have 23 cats at home.
i have been married 3 times.

participant_2.background:
Riding horses is my favorite hobby.
I enjoy collecting autographs from my favorite celebrities and learning more about them.
I need someone who shares my love of the outdoors.
I need my morning coffee to make it through the day at work.
my mom is a checker at the local grocery store.

content.text: Hi there! I'm doing well, just got back from visiting my sister in Canada.
Oh nice! Where in Canada is your sister from?
She lives in Vancouver, it's so beautiful there!
I love Vancouver! I used to live there when I was little.
That's awesome! What made you leave?
My parents moved us to the Midwest for work.
Oh I see. How do you like it there?
It's okay, but I miss the mountains.
I know what you mean, I love the outdoors too. Do you like to ride horses?
I do! It's my favorite hobby.
That's so cool! I've always wanted to learn how to ride.
I'm sure you'd be great at it
